channel.title: Paragon System Sampler - Two Months of Playsets
channel.description:
Released in 2020, Agon is a game by John Harper of Greek heroes and demigods. The core system, [PARAGON](http://agon-rpg.com/), has been applied to several settings and genres. In this two-month event, we will sample four different PARAGON playsets:
### April
[Chamber](https://johnharper.itch.io/chamber) -- sci-fi intrigue [Ruins of Doom](https://matteosciutteri.itch.io/ruins-of-doom) -- OSR-style fantasy dungeon crawl
### May
[Surge Protectors](https://seannittner.itch.io/surge-protectors) -- shapeshifting robot defenders [Rising Tide](https://cosmicbeagle.itch.io/rising-tide) -- ecosystem defense action team
Note: Rising Tide is a playset of my own design, and this will be the first playtest.
### At-a-Glance
* **System** : Paragon * **Schedule** : Four Thursdays in March x 3 hours/session * **Breaks** : Two 10-minute breaks * **Venue** : GM’s Zoom * **Recording Session** : With consent from all players * **Posting Recording** : With consent from all players * **Attendance** : Joining all four sessions is ideal but not required * **Safety** : Lines & Veils, X-Card, Open Table, and any others suggested by the players
**Additional information** :
* GM’s [Statement of Style](https://forms.gle/Fd64WdaafdfE9dCe7)
This game will follow the Gauntlet [Community Code of Conduct](https://www.gauntlet-rpg.com/community-code-of-conduct.html)
